Html:
Got wind of this software over the weekend.  Loving it!

The threat for the Drape of the Righteous is not functional - it shows it as having zero threat when in fact it has excellent threat capabilities (+43 holy damage).

I noticed in the trinket category that Tome of Fiery Redemption was not included as a tps trinket, I was looking for a post on EJ that has it rated @ like 80+ spell dmg because of its 45 second internal cooldown but couldn't find it.

Also Styleen's Impeding Scarab is missing as a trinket <--- yay oldschool

I assume librams will be added in the coming future, please don't forget Libram of Zeal, on a fight where you are refreshing your own judged SoCR it is more tps than DP or Eternal Rest, I assume easiest way to do this is just add an option in buffs for JoCR.

is there a discussion forum/group for rawr.tankadin it feels a little cluttered to put suggestions here, otherwise everything looks decent...a little questionable on some gem choices I'm going to see if I can fine tune it better
